name: gogs
description: Gogs is a simple, self-hosted Git service with a fast UI and minimal resource usage. It supports code hosting, pull requests, issues, and runs easily on small servers, intended for personal or small team use.
features: Minimal Git Hosting: Self-hosted Git service with extremely low resource requirements and fast performance.
Simple Interface: Clean, straightforward web UI focused on essential Git operations.
Pull Requests: Review and merge code changes with basic pull request functionality.
Issue Tracking: Track bugs and features with a lightweight issue management system.
Repository Management: Create, fork, and manage Git repositories through the web interface.
User Management: Support for multiple users and organizations with basic permission controls.
Webhook Support: Trigger external services on push, pull request, and other repository events.
Small Server Friendly: Runs efficiently on Raspberry Pi and other low-powered hardware.
